title: Oprah Town Hall, Nascar, Breonna Taylor, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: Oprah Town Hall, Nascar, Breonna Taylor, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve started singing some Stevie Wonder and he almost cussed. The Chief Love Officer gives his real opinion on revenge sex and helps a man deal with his motor mouth wife. Oprah hosted a two part town hall meeting. Nascar officially banned the confederate flag. We are still in the fight for justice for Breonna Taylor. Sheryl Underwood reminds us stay focused. The OK Cafe restaurant in Atlanta is getting heat because the Georgia confederate flag is hanging up inside. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us about voter suppression and how real it is, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
